content: Hey! Need some crazy deals on your home services, like right now!
Hello! This is XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC services today?
I'm also offering deals! Get your house fixed cheap, call me!
It looks like this message may be unsolicited or spam. To keep our communication helpful, we will have to end this conversation. If you have genuine service needs, please contact us again. Thank you!
